title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-1.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-1.1 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) What is in this

Part. This Part describes who is eligible for medical assistance, how to apply, how eligibility is determined, and what eligible recipients are entitled
to. (b) Related regulations. Regulations at Subchapter E (Parts 500 through 541) of this Title establish
policies and standards for provision of medical assistance services, list fees
and reimbursement for specific medical assistance services, and set forth
requirements for authorization of medical care and billing for provided
services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
360-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
